original: ***Defend this island for 1.5 minutes***
***10 seconds till gates will open. prepare to run***
***the gates are open and the zombies have been trapped for 25 seconds. GOGOGO***
zh_trans: *** 门开了！尸笼25秒后开放！快走***

original: ***boat leaves in 8 seconds***
*** boat has taken off***
*** well done humans. you survived the first island.***
zh_trans: ***做的好人类，你在第一座岛屿上幸存下来了***

original: *** now survive this one for another 1.5 minutes and the teleporter to the next island is activated***
zh_trans: ***在这个岛上再坚守90秒，通往下一个岛屿的传送器90秒后激活***

original: *** 10 seconds left till zombies are trapped. prepare to run to the teleporter***
zh_trans: *** 尸笼10秒后开启，准备从传送器撤离***

original: *** the zombies have been trapped for 25 seconds and the teleporter to the next island have been activated. GOGOGO***
zh_trans: *** 尸笼25秒后开启，通往下一个岛屿的传送器已经开启，现在撤退！***

original: *** youve made it to the final island.***
*** survive here for 1.5 minutes and the voodoo master will take you to the escape route to heaven***
zh_trans: *** 生存90秒，巫毒大师会带你进入通往天堂的逃生通道***

original: ***voodoo master has created a force field from preventing you from falling off island***
zh_trans: ***巫术大师制造了一个力场，以防你掉出岛屿***

original: ***10 seconds till escape route opens***
***entrance to escape route is now open and the zombies have been trapped for 20 seconds. GOGOGO***
zh_trans: *** 逃生通道入口已打开，尸笼20秒后开启，GOGOGO ***

original: ***floating boxes will activate in 17 seconds***
***floating boxes are activated. GOGOGO***
*** teleporter activates in 30 seconds!!!***
*** god hates zombies. only humans allowed in heaven***
zh_trans: *** 上帝憎恨僵尸，天堂只允许人类进入 ***

original: *** teleporter activates in 15 seconds!!!***
*** teleporter activates in 5 seconds!!!***
*** well you made it to heaven. beatiful isnt it?***
*** take a look around and explore and enjoy your stay***
*** hey wait what is this?***
*** oh shit!!!***
